SVIM
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SVIM installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SVIM, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SVIM/2.0.0-foss-2022a
```
